TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: XAML [x:Name attribute](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/b7e61222-e8cf-48d2-acd0-6df3b7685d48) にマップする型のプロパティを報告する型レベル属性を表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 The property that is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute> must be of type <xref:System.String> and must be read\/write.
Frameworks might attribute a certain property of one its architectural base elements to be the XAML name equivalent. This is done so that the concept of a XAML name in a XAML namescope set at XAML load time is available to a framework's programming model at run time.
A XAML name value must use the [XAMLName grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/11e4cada-41d2-494d-9531-0d3df4dfcbe3).
In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF\-specific assembly WindowsBase. In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], <xref:System.Windows.Markup.RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute> is in the System.Xaml assembly. For more information, see [Types Migrated From WPF to System.Xaml](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/d79dabf5-a2ec-4e8d-a37a-67c4ba8a2b91).
## WPF Usage Notes An example of an existing class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] where the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute> is applied is <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>. The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is attributed with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.RuntimeNamePropertyAttribute>, which results in any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived class also using <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> as its run\-time name property.
In general, you do not typically need to apply this attribute in WPF unless you are implementing a new or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>\-parallel framework\-level class. **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** should take precedence over the run\-time name property if both exist as attributes on an element, and a XAML processor implementation generally throws in this case.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: クラスと等価の として使用するプロパティの名前。
Docs.summary: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

remarks.format: ## 解説 指定したプロパティは、型でなければなりません <xref:System.String> get し、アクセスを設定します。

Docs.summary: この で指定されているランタイム名のプロパティの名前を取得 します。
